entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 3 timeouts in SendPacketsAsync on Windows 7 #60204
  • Test failures: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests on windows.11.amd64.clientpre #60191
  • Test failure: NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #60190
  • Loop cloning: generalize recognized loop iteration patterns #60188
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml issue with .NET Fx WS-Fed replies #60184
  • The static `ChangeToken.OnChange` method throws a `StackOverflowException` when its producer factory returns the same change token instance #60183
  • CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182
    6.0.0
  • Create spec/doc for JSON serialization #60178
  • [tvOS] System.Diagnostics.Tests.FileVersionInfoTest failures #60174
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS] System.Drawing.PrimitivesTest.RectangleTests.RectangleFConversionTest failed #60172
  • WebSocket Client does not respond to ping\pong messages #60171
  • .net core application get out of memory exception in App Service environment(windows machine) when the machine memory is still available #60169
  • [tvOS] Library test suites complain about paths #60168
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests failures #60167
  • PlaintextMVC benchmark is slow on arm64 #60166
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS] "System.BadImageFormatException : Invalid serialized string" in System.Reflection.Metadata.Decoding.Tests.CustomAttributeDecoderTests.TestCustomAttributeDecoder #60165
  • Dependency on libm.so.6 is missing in libSystem.IO.Compression.Native.so #60164
  • Loop cloning needs failure tests #60159
    7.0.0
  • TimeZoneNotFoundException: The time zone ID 'America/Chicago' was not found on the local computer. #60175
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #60157
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256/Vector256_ro/Vector256_ro.sh #60154
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_45929\\test45929\\test45929.cmd #60152

Closed

  • Do we need to ship Microsoft.NETCore.TestHost? #60197
  • Investigate using Span in BigInteger implementation #22609
    7.0.0
  • JSON out-of-order metadata property support .net 5 #60186
  • [API Proposal]: List<T> AddRange / InsertRange Overloads #60127
  • Output unexpected literal string in MetricsEventSource.ParseSpecs #60110
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b399444/b399444b/b399444b.sh #60153
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Generics\\GenericsTest\\GenericsTest.cmd #60155
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsTest/GenericsTest.sh #60156
  • GC does not compile when BACKGROUND_GC is not defined. #56186
    Future
  • Make ImmutableArray.CreateRange<T>(IEnumerable<T>) Thread-safe #60126
  • GetSocketOption/SetSocketOption should not close underlying socket #59055
    Future
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames #60151
  • [JIT][arm64] CSE for VSD calls #60025
    7.0.0
  • Published app silently crashes with: Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #59819
    6.0.0
  • superpmi: enable better % improvement number for asm diffs #41653
    Future
  • Will a .net 5 project be able to use AOT feature? #60130

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor the DAC enumerate memory region phase out of gather crash info #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Disable FromHwnd* tests failing on CI #60202
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Drawing
  • [reflection] Return n2m wrapper from RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer #60200
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fallocate sets errno on error, posix_fallocate did not #60185
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Fixed exception type for ConnectionShutdownInitiatedByTransport #60181
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #60170
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • FileStatus.Unix: cache euid/egid in a static. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • [6.0] Port "Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters (#59741)" to 6.0 #60116
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] SafeFileHandle.Unix: don't DeleteOnClose when lock is not successful. #60112
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Finish59071 update ci argsh #60206
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix output log message as literal in MetricsEventSource #60176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Fix Robocopy Verification #60196
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, tenet-performance
  • Rollback verify command changes. #60203
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix GetGenerationWithRange when we have a gen 2 object in the ephemeral segment #60189
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Mark TestHost as non-shipping #60199
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix some of the issues around pgo data collection of stack trace data #59970
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • stop building the package proj #60187
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Override `corehost_resolve_component_dependencies` and `corehost_set_error_writer` PInvokes in singlefile scenario. #60111
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Produce symbols archives #59843
    source-build, area-Setup, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59810
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Check BackgroundService.ExecuteTask for null #60177
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix WebSocket cancel test for non-browser #60173
    area-System.Net
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add support for cloning loops with `<=` conditions #60148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue with incorrect handling of optimized method layouts #60109
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add issue reporting guidelines to CONTRIBUTING.md #60142
    area-Meta
  • Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Check BackgroundService.ExecuteTask for null #60139
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #59989
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Stop running runtime tests on Android arm64 in main build #59772
  • Disable rundownvalidation runtime test on MonoVM #60117
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [wasm] Do not strip dotnet.wasm in Debug build #60134
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support passing total code size through when doing SPMI diffs #60124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeZones Test failure #60150
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make bounds check nodes ordinary binary opers #59963
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58672
    area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Add tests exposing issue #60035 #60047
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Optimize indirection cell call sequences more generally #59602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, needs more info, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Dependency analysis support for generic method reflection #1641

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: CT_HELPER calls and getMethodSig #1640
  • Error MCG0004 while building UWP release package #1638
  • [NativeAOT] SignalR MessagePackHubProtocol #1625

PullRequests

Created

  • regex sampler (utility for regex input generation) #1639

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add some support for floats/doubles/uint/long/byte/ubyte/short/ushort and GT_LE/LT/GE/GT #1637

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new ignores global.json file #21897
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml issue with .NET Fx WS-Fed replies. #21891
  • Freestyle Jenkins msBuild command #21893
  • Specifying both -f ... and -r ... to dotnet build fails to restore if multiple frameworks are present in the project file #21877
  • on win-arm64, Upgrade failed from net 6 RC1 to RC2 with error The installation path for ARM64 SDK installations: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" cannot be the same as for x64 SDK installations: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" #21872

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix 1ES image name #21895
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable signing of tools host on mac #21894
    6.0.1xx
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21885
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1410823 #21913
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add TODO's for Code Violations #57055
  • Refactoring suggestion to turn string. Format into interpolated strings #57054
  • Automatically change namespace hierarchy after moving code files #57053
  • adding Copy function beside method #57052
  • Support auto formatting C # #57051
  • Test plan for "params Span<T>" #57049
  • Test plan for "Primary Constructors" #57048
  • Test plan for "Attributes on Main for top level programs" #57047
  • Test plan for "required properties" #57046
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis appears to report false FlowState, when a switch handles null #57042
  • Red squiggly line in VS when diagnostic is suppressed #57041
  • Possibly incorrect error with explicit conversion of stackalloc to pointer #57040
  • remove redundant assignment IDE0059 not working #57035
  • File scoped namespace prevents contained using statements from being collapsible #57032
  • Hovering over the dot before an invocation shows wrong overload #57031
  • Toplevel Statements and Source Code generation does not work together (CS0759) #57030

PullRequests

Created

  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not pass out a pooled array builder to the editor in lightbulbs #57045
    Area-IDE
  • Disable completion latency guards for integration tests #57044
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57039
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • BoundFixedLocalCollectionInitializer - use BoundConversion nodes to represent element pointer conversion. #57038
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experiment to disable weak compilation refs in the compilation tracker #57037
    Area-IDE
  • Add a remote-control flag to disable storing runtime metadata assemblies weakly. #57036
    Area-IDE
  • Add a remote-control flag to allow us to effectively disable branch-ids #57034
    Area-IDE
  • Separate global and solution completion options #57033
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Null annotate FileCodeModel and the code model service #57026
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • BoundCompoundAssignmentOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54472
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Exclude the traits file from codeowners #57021
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • List patterns: Correctly report the missing member #56287
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • EE: ignore modules with bad metadata headers #57015
    Interactive-Debugging, Next
  • Add missing commits that weren't in the blame ignore #57019
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57024
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57056
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Record status for "Semi-auto-properties" #57013
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • BoundForEachStatement - use BoundConversion nodes to represent conversions in the node. #57010
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Log unexpected cancellation state in RemoteCallback<T> #57005
    Area-IDE
  • BoundConvertedSwitchExpression - do not store Conversion in the node. #57022
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle switch expressions inside function pointer invocations. #56991
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Undo workarounds added to dockerfile while updating to 7.0 SDK #37406
  • Blazor: allow to specify an additional handler on a two-way binding #37405
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #37402
  • More robust identification of the build OS in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #37400
  • .NET6 rc1 + Azure Pipeline Does not publish xml documentation files #37399
  • Move back to NPM #37398
  • Automatically provision nodejs if not present as part of the build #37397
  • Automatically download the JDK as part of the build if not present #37396
  • Can't run Blazor WASM in WSL launch profile #37393
  • Input validation status gets mixed up when toggling content #37391
  • InputBase sets wrong aria-invalid attribute value when validation failes #37389
  • Blazor WASM site flagged as malicious by Google Ads #37388
  • Rate Limiting for Yarp implementations #37387
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Work with the runtime team to consume rate limiters in the BCL #37386
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Move RateLiming abstractions/APIs to dotnet/runtime #37385
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Implement RateLimiting Middleware in aspnetcore #37384
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Design Generic RateLimiter APIs #37383
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Ship current rate limiting abstractions and implementations from asplabs to an internal transport feed. #37382
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Finish implementations for non-generic RateLimiters• Fixed windows• Sliding windows• Token bucket• Concurrency limiter #37381
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Epic: Rate/Resource Limiting #37380
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37379
  • Perf improvement: json, json_nodejs #37378
  • ⏱️ Call to action: Help shape the ASP.NET Core 7 #37373
    Discussions
  • MinLength, MaxLength and <select> #37371

Closed

  • Razor SDK test fixture exception causing tests to fail #37413
  • Identity Server Logout Problem #37327
    6.0.0
  • Support better error messages for OAuthHandler #33351
    7.0-preview1
  • Is it really correct that I get "Authorization failed" message when not logged in? #37394
  • TemplateBuilder is Missing .Net 5 #37390
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 6 #27883
    6.0.0
  • Provide an API experience that scales down well and is easier to learn #27724
    6.0.0
  • User learning arc for new minimal/focused ASP.NET Core API experience #30580
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add / update PR templates #37412
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix MSBuild property name for MicrosoftBuildTasksCoreVersion #37411
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #37409
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #37407
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update build.gradle #36477
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Add more `crossgen2` dependencies #37410
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Remove `SkipNonexistentProjects` settings #37372
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix MSBuild property name for Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core #37404
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix build on arm64 machines #37374
    7.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21480.20 #37192
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Honoring error information on OAuth Exchange Code #37224
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure
  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Indecipherable exception when loading a MauiImage into an Image view #2893
  • [Bug] CollectionView EmptyView using a View never appears on Android #2892
  • [Bug] CollectionView ScrollTo methods not working on Android #2891
  • [Bug] Wrong Layout and Behaviors using Grouped CollectionView on Android #2890
  • [Bug] Crash trying to use RefreshView on Android #2889
  • [Bug] Obsolete some of the AutomationProperties? #2888
  • [Bug] Labels should have cross thread checking #2887
  • [Bug] Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.Web.WebView2.Wpf.WebView2.add_AcceleratorKeyPressed #2885
  • [Bug] VS 2022 automatic selecting wrong jdk-11 #2884
  • [Bug] Not rendering Shadows off-screen controls in ScrollView #2881
  • Button text not rendered properly in RTL flow direction #2880
  • How to create Device Tests for Maui projects #2879
  • [Bug] WinUI: Entry.Text is always null #2877

Closed

  • [Bug] Build fails if the project path contains special characters. #1596
  • [Bug] Deploy to android device gets skipped #2878

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the simplest sandbox app #2886
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Apply layout updates to ShellPageContainer child pages #2876

Updated

  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #2841
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Move IDispatcher logic out of IPlatformServices #2862
    area/controls 🎮
  • WinUI Toolbar Handler #2875
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add `ITextButton` and related Mappers #2868
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add code to use `@(MauiIcon)` instead of `@(MauiImage)` with several properties #2869
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Essentials] Set the PopoverPresentationController for files too #2870
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Update LocationExtensions.ios.tvos.watchos.macos.cs #2871
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Fix orientation rotation delay on Android #2872
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Implement the new ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback for N+ #2873
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Cleanup docs on pick file #2874
    area/essentials 🍞

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When looking up methods via reflection, be trimming/AOT-friendly #26288
  • SqliteConnection.Open/Close allocate StateChangeEventArgs per every call #26283
  • Using postgre database, paging query performance issues #26282

Closed

  • Sql Server Feature Request: Dynamic Order By clause #26284
  • Preserve DeleteBehavior when scaffolding a database created by EF Core #21252
    6.0.0-rc1
  • Removing a migration can lead to an incorrect snapshot rollback #19637
    5.0.0
  • Using Mysql database Collation function ForMySQLHasCollation() with dotnet ef command not generating correct ModelSnapshot #26280
  • Warning Entity 'Role' has a global query filter defined and is the required end of a relationship with the entity in a Many to Many relationships #26185
  • EFCore 5.0 - UseRelationalNulls value is not being honored #26138

PullRequests

Created

  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
  • Make Projection_AsEnumerable_projection deterministic #26285
  • [6.0] Fix to #26271 - Temporal history table name always based on entity type name, not table name #26281
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet --info Duplicate output information #12264

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for targeting Windows SDK 10.0.22000.0 #12276
  • Add support for targeting Windows SDK 10.0.22000.0 #12275
  • Handle workload manifests as text-only packages in source-build #12271
  • [ArPow] Resolve prebuilts for dotnet/roslyn #12268

Merged

  • Update dependency from dotnet/source-build-reference-packages #12267
  • [ArPow] Re-enable source-build tarball PR validation #12245

Updated

  • Add support for targeting Windows version 22000 #12258
    Servicing-approved
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #12236
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
